00033 #ifndef _LUSTRE_LMV_H
00034 #define _LUSTRE_LMV_H
00035 #include <lustre/lustre_idl.h>
00036 
00037 struct lmv_oinfo {
00038         struct lu_fid   lmo_fid;
00039         u32             lmo_mds;
00040         struct inode    *lmo_root;
00041 };
00042 
00043 struct lmv_stripe_md {
00044         __u32   lsm_md_magic;
00045         __u32   lsm_md_stripe_count;
00046         __u32   lsm_md_master_mdt_index;
00047         __u32   lsm_md_hash_type;
00048         __u32   lsm_md_layout_version;
00049         __u32   lsm_md_default_count;
00050         __u32   lsm_md_default_index;
00051         char    lsm_md_pool_name[LOV_MAXPOOLNAME + 1];
00052         struct lmv_oinfo lsm_md_oinfo[0];
00053 };
00054 
00055 static inline bool
00056 lsm_md_eq(const struct lmv_stripe_md *lsm1, const struct lmv_stripe_md *lsm2)
00057 {
00058         __u32 idx;
00059 
00060         if (lsm1->lsm_md_magic != lsm2->lsm_md_magic ||
00061             lsm1->lsm_md_stripe_count != lsm2->lsm_md_stripe_count ||
00062             lsm1->lsm_md_master_mdt_index !=
00063                                 lsm2->lsm_md_master_mdt_index ||
00064             lsm1->lsm_md_hash_type != lsm2->lsm_md_hash_type ||
00065             lsm1->lsm_md_layout_version !=
00066                                 lsm2->lsm_md_layout_version ||
00067             strcmp(lsm1->lsm_md_pool_name,
00068                       lsm2->lsm_md_pool_name) != 0)
00069                 return false;
00070 
00071         for (idx = 0; idx < lsm1->lsm_md_stripe_count; idx++) {
00072                 if (!lu_fid_eq(&lsm1->lsm_md_oinfo[idx].lmo_fid,
00073                                &lsm2->lsm_md_oinfo[idx].lmo_fid))
00074                         return false;
00075         }
00076 
00077         return true;
00078 }
00079 union lmv_mds_md;
00080 
00081 void lmv_free_memmd(struct lmv_stripe_md *lsm);
00082 
00083 int lmvea_load_shards(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *obj,
00084                       struct lu_dirent *ent, struct lu_buf *buf,
00085                       bool resize);
00086 
00087 static inline void lmv1_le_to_cpu(struct lmv_mds_md_v1 *lmv_dst,
00088                                   const struct lmv_mds_md_v1 *lmv_src)
00089 {
00090         __u32 i;
00091 
00092         lmv_dst->lmv_magic = le32_to_cpu(lmv_src->lmv_magic);
00093         lmv_dst->lmv_stripe_count = le32_to_cpu(lmv_src->lmv_stripe_count);
00094         lmv_dst->lmv_master_mdt_index =
00095                                 le32_to_cpu(lmv_src->lmv_master_mdt_index);
00096         lmv_dst->lmv_hash_type = le32_to_cpu(lmv_src->lmv_hash_type);
00097         lmv_dst->lmv_layout_version = le32_to_cpu(lmv_src->lmv_layout_version);
00098         for (i = 0; i < lmv_src->lmv_stripe_count; i++)
00099                 fid_le_to_cpu(&lmv_dst->lmv_stripe_fids[i],
00100                               &lmv_src->lmv_stripe_fids[i]);
00101 }
00102 
00103 static inline void lmv_le_to_cpu(union lmv_mds_md *lmv_dst,
00104                                  const union lmv_mds_md *lmv_src)
00105 {
00106         switch (le32_to_cpu(lmv_src->lmv_magic)) {
00107         case LMV_MAGIC_V1:
00108                 lmv1_le_to_cpu(&lmv_dst->lmv_md_v1, &lmv_src->lmv_md_v1);
00109                 break;
00110         default:
00111                 break;
00112         }
00113 }
00114 
00115 /* This hash is only for testing purpose */
00116 static inline unsigned int
00117 lmv_hash_all_chars(unsigned int count, const char *name, int namelen)
00118 {
00119         unsigned int c = 0;
00120         const unsigned char *p = (const unsigned char *)name;
00121 
00122         while (--namelen >= 0)
00123                 c += p[namelen];
00124 
00125         c = c % count;
00126 
00127         return c;
00128 }
00129 
00130 static inline unsigned int
00131 lmv_hash_fnv1a(unsigned int count, const char *name, int namelen)
00132 {
00133         __u64 hash;
00134 
00135         hash = lustre_hash_fnv_1a_64(name, namelen);
00136 
00137         return do_div(hash, count);
00138 }
00139 
00140 static inline int lmv_name_to_stripe_index(__u32 lmv_hash_type,
00141                                            unsigned int stripe_count,
00142                                            const char *name, int namelen)
00143 {
00144         int     idx;
00145         __u32   hash_type = lmv_hash_type & LMV_HASH_TYPE_MASK;
00146 
00147         LASSERT(namelen > 0);
00148         if (stripe_count <= 1)
00149                 return 0;
00150 
00151         /* for migrating object, always start from 0 stripe */
00152         if (lmv_hash_type & LMV_HASH_FLAG_MIGRATION)
00153                 return 0;
00154 
00155         switch (hash_type) {
00156         case LMV_HASH_TYPE_ALL_CHARS:
00157                 idx = lmv_hash_all_chars(stripe_count, name, namelen);
00158                 break;
00159         case LMV_HASH_TYPE_FNV_1A_64:
00160                 idx = lmv_hash_fnv1a(stripe_count, name, namelen);
00161                 break;
00162         default:
00163                 idx = -EBADFD;
00164                 break;
00165         }
00166 
00167         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "name %.*s hash_type %d idx %d\n", namelen, name,
00168                hash_type, idx);
00169 
00170         return idx;
00171 }
00172 
00173 static inline bool lmv_is_known_hash_type(__u32 type)
00174 {
00175         return (type & LMV_HASH_TYPE_MASK) == LMV_HASH_TYPE_FNV_1A_64 ||
00176                (type & LMV_HASH_TYPE_MASK) == LMV_HASH_TYPE_ALL_CHARS;
00177 }
00178
